content: this is crochet doll pattern/ amigurumi pattern in pdf file not the actual toys language english **size ** if you use yarn as me the finished totoro will be 12cm / 4 8inch tall **materials and tools required ** - yarn any sport or dk light weight yarn i used yarnart jeans - crochet hook size 2-2 5 mm - yarn needle - scissors - black embroidery thread - safety eyes 5 00 mm - white wool felt - fiberfill - stitch marker **basic crochet skills required ** the magic_ring chain slip_stitch single_crochet double_crochet increase decrease and how to change color should you have any questions regarding this crochet pattern or need assistance please feel free to contact us via the following channels - direct message - instagram demiwool if you are unable to find the files kindly contact demiwool via direct message providing your email address *this pattern is for personal use only please do not copy re-selling share translate or distribute all or part of this pattern you may sell finished products from this pattern provided using the hashtag #demiwool to credit us as designer *
